useFocusableInteractive.description:
Description

Elements with an interactive role and interaction handlers must be focusable.
HTML elements with interactive roles must havetabIndexdefined to ensure they are
focusable. Without tabIndex, assistive technologies may not recognize these elements as
interactive.
You could also consider switching from an interactive role to its semantic HTML element
instead.
useFocusableInteractive.option: This rule has no specific options.
